name: Democracy Droid!
tagline: This (free as in speech) application streams and downloads Democracy Now! The war and peace report.
body:
# Free Democracy Now! for Android This program streams and downloads episodes of Democracy Now!. It uses the SimplisticRss library by ShirwaM and Picasso.
##Democracy Now?!? Democracy Now! is a national, daily, independent, award-winning news program hosted by journalists Amy Goodman and Juan Gonzalez. Pioneering the largest public media collaboration in the U.S.,
##Disclaimer I have no affiliation with Democracy Now! (they won't even return my emails). ##Should I keep todoing?:
  • Add podcast (audio) downloads.
  • Fix descriptions.
  • Add a Video-Viewer Activity?
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
